name: arstechnica
text: "[#Neuralink] has a solid solution to the problem of compressing the complicated data its hardware will gather, and the team made some major revisions to its designs, all of which seem to simplify the implant and the surgery needed to put it in place." https://t.co/QqkxXKxXYx

name: arstechnica
text: "Now that the Pixel 4a has finally arrived, it feels like it's built for the era. It's a cheap, functional, utilitarian design that arrives at a time when the economy is not doing so hot. This phone is the cure for people who are sick of $1000 smartphones" https://t.co/UBDfgR4itT https://t.co/psoUecDnV4
